Summary: All product images are displayed identically on the products page
Creator: Gokhan Ergucel
Description:
Environment:

* Browser: Chrome
* OS: macOS
* Environment: Demo / Test

Preconditions:

* User has a valid and active account
* User is logged in successfully
* User is on the Products page

Steps to Reproduce:

# Log in to the application with valid credentials
# Navigate to the All items page
# Observe the images displayed for each listed product
# Compare the product images

Expected Result:
Each product should display a unique and correct image corresponding to the product

Actual Result:
All products display the same image instead of unique images

Severity:
Medium

Priority:
P3 - Medium
